post:
September 2020 marks the beginning of a new way of working: distance learning, teleworking. 
Companies must therefore be equipped with the right tools, and we wish to accompany them in this transition.

IKOULA is therefore launching an exceptional offer: 50% off for life, regardless of the commitment period chosen 
(valid on all Flex and Flexi Cloud plans, excluding options and renewals) until 01/10/2020. Find out more at http://ow.ly/Kq4f50ByKng
